q: President Bush 's closest advisers, saying Condoleezza Rice lacked experience and Colin Powell showed poor management skills. Asked whether he admired his ex-boss's father president George H.W. Bush - under whom he did not serve- Donald Rumsfeld replied curtly: No, I was kind of disappointed in him. While Dermot O'Leary would love to continue working with Simon Cowell by taking a role on the US' X Factor' he is trying not to worry about it. He said: I'm keeping my head out of it. I want to do it but I'm being philosophical about it. If I get it that's fantastic and if I don't, I don't.
